trans-unit.source: Binds the value of a property of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to a parameter object.
trans-unit.target: 속성 값을 바인딩하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> 매개 변수 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use the ControlParameter class to bind the value of a <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> property, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>, to a parameter that is used in a parameterized SQL query, business object method, or filtering expression.
trans-unit.target: ControlParameter 클래스를 사용 하 여의 값에 바인딩할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>속성을 같은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>또는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A>, 매개 변수가 있는 SQL 쿼리, 비즈니스 개체 메서드 또는 필터링 식에 사용 되는 매개 변수에.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedIndex%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: The ControlParameter class provides two properties in addition to those inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> class: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: ControlParameter 클래스에서 상속 하는 것 외에도 두 개 속성도 제공는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>클래스: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> property identifies which <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> instance to bind to and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property identifies the public property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> from which the ControlParameter class retrieves a value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>속성을 식별 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>바인딩할 인스턴스 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>속성의 public 속성을 식별 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>ControlParameter 클래스에서 값을 검색할.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new unnamed instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 명명 되지 않은 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is created with the ControlParameter constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>ControlParameter 생성자를 사용 하 여 만든 개체는 모든 속성에 대 한 기본 값으로 초기화 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> properties are initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>속성 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> 초기화 됩니다</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> property is initialized to <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>, and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property is initialized to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 또한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>속성은 초기화 <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>속성은 초기화 <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>속성은 초기화 <xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>속성은 초기화 `null`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Data.ParameterDirection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class with values from the specified instance.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 지정 된 인스턴스에 대 한 값이 포함 된 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The ControlParameter constructor is a protected copy constructor that is used to clone a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> instance.
trans-unit.target: ControlParameter 생성자는 복제에 사용 되는 보호 된 복사 생성자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>인스턴스.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: The values of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object, including the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> properties, are all transferred to the new instance.
trans-unit.target: 값은 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>개체를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>속성은 모두를 새 인스턴스로 전달 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> instance from which the current instance is initialized.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 현재 인스턴스 초기화 되는 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class, using the specified control name to identify which control to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 새를 초기화의 명명 된 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 클래스를 지정 된 컨트롤 이름을 사용 하 여 바인딩할 컨트롤을 식별 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is created with the ControlParameter constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name and <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> name, which identifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> that the parameter binds to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>ControlParameter 생성자를 사용 하 여 만든 개체는 지정 된 매개 변수 이름으로 초기화 됩니다 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>이름을 식별 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>매개 변수를 바인딩하.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: Other properties, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>, are initialized with default values.
trans-unit.target: 다른 속성을 포함 하 여 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>, 기본 값으로 초기화 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수에 바인딩되는 컨트롤의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class, using the specified property name and control name to identify which control to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 새를 초기화의 명명 된 인스턴스는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 클래스, 바인딩할 컨트롤을 식별 하는 지정 된 속성 이름 및 컨트롤 이름을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is created with the ControlParameter constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> name, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property, which identifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> that the parameter binds to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>ControlParameter 생성자를 사용 하 여 만든 개체가 지정 된 매개 변수 이름으로 초기화 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>이름, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>을 식별 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>매개 변수를 바인딩하.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: Other properties, including <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>, are initialized with default values.
trans-unit.target: 다른 속성을 포함 하 여 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>, 기본 값으로 초기화 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수에 바인딩되는 컨트롤의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property on the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수에 바인딩되는 컨트롤에서 속성의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class by using the specified parameter name, database type, control ID, and property name.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 지정한 매개 변수 이름, 데이터베이스 유형, 컨트롤 ID 및 속성 이름을 사용 하 여 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The data type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 데이터 형식 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수에 바인딩되는 컨트롤의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수에 바인딩되는 컨트롤의 속성의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new named and strongly typed instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> class, using the specified property name and control name to identify which control to bind to.
trans-unit.target: 명명 된 인수와 강력한 형식의 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 클래스, 바인딩할 컨트롤을 식별 하는 지정 된 속성 이름 및 컨트롤 이름을 사용 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object that is created with the ControlParameter constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> name, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>ControlParameter 생성자를 사용 하 여 만든 개체가 지정 된 매개 변수 이름으로 초기화 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>이름 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Type%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> properties are initialized with default values.
trans-unit.target: 만 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A>속성이 기본 값으로 초기화 됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.ConvertEmptyStringToNull%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Direction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The type that the parameter represents.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수를 나타내는 형식입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.TypeCode?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수에 바인딩되는 컨트롤의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The name of the property of the control that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 매개 변수에 바인딩되는 컨트롤의 속성의 이름입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns a duplicate of the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 현재 복제본을 반환 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 인스턴스.

trans-unit.source: The Clone method calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.%23ctor%2A> copy constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> class with the values of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Clone 메서드 호출의 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.%23ctor%2A>의 새 인스턴스를 초기화 하는 복사 생성자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>현재 인스턴스의 값을 가진 클래스.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> that is an exact duplicate of the current one.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 의 현재 환경의 복제본입니다.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the control that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> object binds to.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤의 이름을 지정 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 개체 바인딩됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The ControlID property is a required property that identifies the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> instance that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object binds to at run time.
trans-unit.target: ControlID 속성을 식별 하는 필수 속성은는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>인스턴스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>개체는 런타임 시 바인딩됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the ControlID and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> properties are set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> method to correctly bind to a control.
trans-unit.target: 일반적으로 ControlID 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>속성에 대해 설정 된는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>메서드는 컨트롤에 올바르게 바인딩할.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you do not set the ControlID property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception when called.
trans-unit.target: ControlID 속성을 설정 하지 않으면는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>메서드가 throw는 <xref:System.ArgumentException>호출 하는 동안 예외가 발생 했습니다.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the name of a Web server control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> 웹 서버 컨트롤의 이름을 나타내는입니다.

trans-unit.source: Updates and returns the value of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 값을 반환 하 고 업데이트는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object attempts to bind to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object and property every time the Evaluate method is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>에 개체 바인딩하려는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>개체 및 속성 Evaluate 메서드를 호출할 때마다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: The Evaluate method returns the value of the control's property that is identified by the combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 조합으로 식별 되는 컨트롤의 속성의 값을 반환 하는 Evaluate 메서드는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>및 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.PropertyName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> class never uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property, which is inherited from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>, when binding to a control's property value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>되지 클래스에서 사용 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>속성에서 상속 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>컨트롤의 속성 값에 바인딩될 때.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > In this implementation of the method, the `context` parameter is ignored.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 메서드의이 구현에서는 `context` 매개 변수가 무시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If the `control` parameter is `null`, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 `control` 매개 변수는 `null`, `null` 반환 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> of the request.
trans-unit.target: 현재 <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> 요청 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> that the parameter is bound to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref> 에 바인딩된 매개 변수입니다.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the updated and current value of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>매개 변수 업데이트 하 고 현재 값을 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the property name of the control identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID*> property that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> object binds to.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 컨트롤의 속성 이름을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID*>속성 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 개체 바인딩됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID*>

trans-unit.source: The PropertyName property identifies the public property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control> object identified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> property that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> object binds to at run time.
trans-unit.target: PropertyName 속성의 public 속성을 식별는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Control>로 식별 된 개체는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>속성 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>개체는 런타임 시 바인딩됩니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control>

trans-unit.source: PropertyName can be set to a simple string, such as "SelectedValue", or an expression using <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A> syntax to identify complex control properties.
trans-unit.target: PropertyName "SelectedValue" 또는 사용 하는 식은 같은 간단한 문자열로 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A>복잡 한 제어 속성을 식별 하려면 다음 구문을 사용 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataBinder.Eval%2A>

trans-unit.source: While the PropertyName property is optional, typically both <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> and PropertyName properties are set for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> method to correctly bind to a control.
trans-unit.target: PropertyName 속성은 선택 사항 하는 동안 일반적으로 둘 다 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>PropertyName 속성에 대해 설정 하 고는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>컨트롤에 올바르게 바인딩할 메서드를.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A> property but not the PropertyName property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> method attempts to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute> attribute to identify a default PropertyName property.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>속성이 있지만 PropertyName 속성이 아닌는 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>메서드를 사용 하려고 합니다.는 <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute>특성 기본 PropertyName 속성을 식별 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.ControlID%2A>

trans-unit.source: (It is the responsibility of control authors to specify this attribute.) If this fails, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: (이 컨트롤 작성자가이 특성을 지정 해야 합니다.) 이 작업에 실패 하면 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>throw는 <xref:System.ArgumentException>예외.</xref:System.ArgumentException> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table identifies which ASP.NET controls decorate properties with the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 사용 하 여 속성을 데코레이팅하는 ASP.NET 컨트롤을 식별 하는 <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute>특성.</xref:System.Web.UI.ControlValuePropertyAttribute>

trans-unit.source: |Control|Property| |-------------|--------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedValue%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.SelectedValue%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedValue%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>|
trans-unit.target: | 컨트롤 | 속성 | |-------------|--------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedValue%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.SelectedValue%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedValue%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox.Text%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListControl></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label.Text%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Label></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList.SelectedValue%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox.Checked%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar.SelectedDate%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Calendar>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""></xref> that represents the name of a control's property that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"></xref> binds to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_string" name="string" href=""> </xref> 컨트롤의 속성 이름을 나타내는 하는 <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter"> </xref> 에 바인딩합니다.
